Getting Started

  • Home
  • Getting Started
  • Create your UltraNote GUI wallet
  • Create your UltraNote paper wallet
  • Getting XUNI Coins

Create your UltraNote wallet on Windows

1. Download UltraNote wallet for Windows from this link.

2. Once downloaded, extract the wallet folder to your desktop and open UltraNoteWallet.exe.

3. A new wallet will be created for you, and the blockchain will start syncing.

4. Encrypt your wallet and set a password. Go to Settings and then click Encrypt Wallet.

5. Backup your wallet. Go to File and click Backup Wallet. Save the .wallet file to your computer and make a copy on a USB or another computer.

6. Copy your private key. Click on Receive > Show private spend key and private view key.

Create your UltraNote wallet on Linux

1. Download UltraNote wallet for Linux from this link.

2. Once downloaded, Open your terminal and cd to the download folder.

3. Type: sudo dpkg -i UltraNoteInfinity-1.0.2-beta.amd64.deb

4. An UltraNote wallet shortcut will be added to your menu. Find it and start your wallet.

5. A new wallet will be created for you and the blockchain will start syncing.

6. Encrypt your wallet and set a password. Go to Settings and then click Encrypt Wallet.

7. Backup your wallet. Go to File and click Backup Wallet. Save the .wallet file to your computer and make a copy on a USB or another computer.

8. Copy your private key. Click on Receive > Show private spend key and private view key.

Create your UltraNote wallet on Mac

1. Download UltraNote wallet for Mac from this link.

2. Once downloaded, double click UltraNoteWallet-1.0.16-beta.dmg and start installing your wallet.

3. Open Finder and search for UltraNoteWallet then start it and the blockchain will start syncing.

4. Encrypt your wallet and set a password. Go to Settings and then click Encrypt Wallet.

5. Backup your wallet. Go to File and click Backup Wallet. Save the .wallet file to your computer and make a copy on a USB or another computer.

6. Copy your private key. Click on Receive > Show private spend key and private view key.

Create your UltraNote paper wallet

1. To create an UltraNote paper wallet please vist this link.

2. Fill the needed info with wallet name and purpose.

3. Click Generate Wallet.

4. Print or copy your wallet private key and public address.

Getting XUNI Coins

There are 2 options to get XUNI coins:

1. By mining XUNI coins using your UltraNote wallet or any other mining software.

2. By buying the coins on exchange. XUNI is listed today on LocalCryptos.Club.
